description: This file implements a geocoding service using the Nominatim API from OpenStreetMap. It provides a function to geocode addresses into latitude and longitude with optional parameters and includes internal utility functions for coordinate validation and sanitization.

methods.name: toFiniteNumber(value)
methods.description: Converts a value to a finite number or returns null if the result is not finite.

methods.name: clampLat(lat)
methods.description: Clamps latitude values between -90 and 90 degrees.

methods.name: clampLng(lng)
methods.description: Wraps longitude values to the range [-180, 180].

methods.name: safeReadJson(resp)
methods.description: Safely reads and parses JSON from a fetch response, returning null on error.

methods.name: geocodeAddress(address, { countryCodes = "in", limit = 1, profiler } = {})
methods.description: Performs geocoding of an address string using Nominatim API, returning latitude, longitude, and display name.

ctags.name: geocodeAddress
ctags.pattern: /^export async function geocodeAddress(address, { countryCodes = "in", limit = 1, profiler } = {})/
